text: tavada “(oba sihinen dutu) me andamatama obage deviyan obava toragena, sihinayange artha dækvimda, obata uganva di, oba kerehida, yakubge (anit) pavule udaviya kerehida, ohu tamange varaprasadayan puranaya kara tabanu æta. me andamatama meyata pera ibrahim, ishak adi obage mutun mittan dedena kerehida (tamange varaprasadaya vana) eya puranaya kara tæbuveya. niyata vasayenma obage deviyan (siyalla) hondin danneku ha gnanaya ayat ayeku vasayen sitinneya” (yayida pævasuveya)
